description: RARE OPPORTUNITY in Greyhawke Estates. Units in this well maintained complex on Westwood Plateau seldom come on the market. Beautiful Duplex Townhouse with 3 beds & 3 baths. 2273sf (2198sf Strata Plan) of spacious living. PRIVATE setting with green spaces in front as well as a backyard for outdoor entertainment or just watching the hummingbirds play ! School Catchment for Bramblewood Elementary School (K-5), Summit Middle School (6-8) & Heritage Woods Secondary (9-12). 7 Visitors Parking spaces conveniently located. Transit stops just outside the complex on Lansdowne Drive. This opportunity will not last too long. Flexible Dates ! OFFERS anytime, GRAB IT before it's gone ! Call your Realtor NOW ! Access is off Lansdowne Drive, NOT Panorama.
